'''''Vinyar Tengwar 17''''' is the seventeenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|16|18}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Radagast" — Patrick H. Wynne
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Words and Devices: Apologia" (column) — Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne
* "''Essitalmar'': Quenya Rag" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: Who's Afraid of the Big, Bad Gollum?" (column) — Arden R. Smith
